title: This Tiny Shift Makes a Big Difference
itunes:title: This Tiny Shift Makes a Big Difference
description:
Today I will teach you a simple shift in your words that will make a massive difference in the way you view the world and the gratitude that you feel.

 

Want to master your mindset? Every Monday I send out an email with mindset tips for the week, click here to receive that email: http://mondayemail.com/

Follow me on IG for more inspiration here: https://www.instagram.com/robdialjr/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
